endpoints.description: Submit detailed borrower information for creditworthiness analysis.
Retrieve the current operational status of predictive models.
Obtain model-generated loan product recommendations based on borrower profiles.
Submit potential borrowers' financial datasets for model compatibility review.
Request calculated credit scores from predictive models.
Update model parameters with newly derived statistics or policies.
Submit a batch of borrower profiles for group creditworthiness evaluations.
Remove outdated or irrelevant borrower data from the analysis database.
Access external financial markets data leveraged in predictive models.
Retrieve details ensuring compliance with financial regulations and standards.
